document.heading: Criminal Code and Clarifying Technical Amendments Act of 1999

history.narrative: Law 13-49, the “Criminal Code and Clarifying Technical Amendments Act of 1999,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-61, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 2, 1999, and April 13, 1999, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 13, 1999, it was assigned Act No. 13-69 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-49 became effective on October 19, 1999.
